channel.title: 49ers Radio
channel.description: The official podcast of the San Francisco 49ers.
channel.itunes:author: San Francisco 49ers
channel.itunes:summary: The official podcast of the San Francisco 49ers.

item.title: 49ers Radio: Previewing Levi'sÂ® Stadium Opener
item.description: 49ers.com contributors Taylor Price, Andrew Pentis and Eric Stark discuss Sunday's preseason home opener for the San Francisco 49ers against the Denver Broncos, plus answer training camp questions from the 49ers Faithful.
item.itunes:subtitle: 49ers.com contributors Taylor Price, Andrew Pentis and Eric Stark discuss Sunday's preseason home opener for the San Francisco 49ers against the Denver Broncos, plus answer training camp questions from the 49ers Faithful.

item.title: 49ers Radio: Chef Michael Mina Talks Food and Football
item.description: The celebrity chef and die-hard San Francisco 49ers football fan spoke with 49ers Radio about how he's blending his two passions at Levi's Stadium.
item.itunes:subtitle: The celebrity chef and die-hard San Francisco 49ers football fan spoke with 49ers Radio about how he's blending his two passions at Levi's Stadium.

item.title: 49ers Radio: First Week of Training Camp
item.description: 49ers.com contributors Taylor Price and Andrew Pentis recap the first week of action at San Francisco 49ers training camp.
item.itunes:subtitle: 49ers.com contributors Taylor Price and Andrew Pentis recap the first week of action at San Francisco 49ers training camp.

item.title: 49ers Radio: Players to Watch at Training Camp
item.description: 49ers.com contributors Taylor Price and Andrew Pentis look at the players and positions to watch in San Francisco's upcoming training camp.
item.itunes:subtitle: 49ers.com contributors Taylor Price and Andrew Pentis look at the players and positions to watch in San Francisco's upcoming training camp.

item.title: 49ers Radio: Impressions From OTAs
item.itunes:subtitle: 49ers.com's Scott Kegley and Taylor Price are back to give their thoughts on OTAs, including which players have stood out.

item.title: 49ers Radio: Rookie Camp Preview
item.itunes:subtitle: As the San Francisco 49ers rookie mincamp approaches, Scott Kegley and Taylor Price discuss some of the key storylines and players who could make immediate impacts.

item.title: 49ers Radio: Get to Know Jimmie Ward
item.itunes:subtitle: First-round pick Jimmie Ward discusses joining the San Francisco 49ers.

item.title: 49ers Radio: LB Chris Borland Familiar with 49ers Defense
item.itunes:subtitle: Wisconsin linebacker Chris Borland thought he would be drafted earlier, but falling to the San Francisco 49ers was a "blessing in disguise."

item.title: 49ers Radio: Who Will the 49ers Take in the 2014 NFL Draft?
item.itunes:subtitle: After months of debate, 49ers.com's Scott Kegley and Taylor Price give their final predictions for the 2014 NFL Draft and offer perspective on past 49ers drafts.

item.title: 49ers Radio: Most Underrated 49ers Games
item.itunes:subtitle: Scott Kegley and Taylor Price discuss which key games are currently flying under the radar on the San Francisco 49ers 2014 schedule.

item.title: Cover 2 Podcast: 49ers Preseason Schedule
item.description: Senior Reporter Taylor Price is joined by 49ers VP/Executive Producer Robert Alberino and 49ers.com Digital Media Strategist Eric Stark to break down the team's 2014 preseason schedule.
item.itunes:subtitle: Senior Reporter Taylor Price is joined by 49ers VP/Executive Producer Robert Alberino and 49ers.com Digital Media Strategist Eric Stark to break down the team's 2014 preseason schedule.

item.title: Cover 2 Podcast: Mock Draft Picks
item.itunes:subtitle: Who will the San Francisco 49ers select in the first round of the 2014 NFL Draft? Scott Kegley and Taylor Price discuss 49ers.com's staff picks.

item.title: Cover 2 Podcast: Free Agency Begins
item.itunes:subtitle: Scott Kegley and Taylor Price discuss the 49ers moves on the first day of free agency.

item.title: Cover 2 Podcast: Combine Recap
item.itunes:subtitle: Scott Kegley and Taylor Price recap the main headlines from the first four days of the NFL Scouting Combine.

item.title: Cover 2 Podcast: Day 3 Standouts
item.itunes:subtitle: Scott Kegley and Taylor Price are back to discuss which wide receivers caught their eyes at the NFL Scouting Combine.

item.title: Cover 2 Podcast: Right Fit for 49ers
item.itunes:subtitle: Scott Kegley and Taylor Price discuss which players could be a fit for the 49ers and other notes from the second day of media interviews.

item.title: Cover 2 Podcast: Jim Harbaugh in Indy
item.itunes:subtitle: Scott Kegley and Taylor Price discuss some of the main topics from the opening day of the 2014 NFL Scouting Combine.

item.title: Path to the Draft: Dee Ford Dominates Senior Bowl
item.description: NFL Draft analyst Matt Miller of BleacherReport.com discusses the fallout from the 2014 Senior Bowl and how Auburn defensive end Dee Ford raised his draft stock in our first "Path to the Draft Podcast."
item.itunes:subtitle: NFL Draft analyst Matt Miller of BleacherReport.com discusses the fallout from the 2014 Senior Bowl and how Auburn defensive end Dee Ford raised his draft stock in our first "Path to the Draft Podcast."

item.title: Teddy Football: 49ers Make History
item.description: Can the 49ers win conference championships two years in a row on the road? Scott Kegley and Ted Robinson weigh in.
item.itunes:subtitle: Can the 49ers win conference championships two years in a row on the road? Scott Kegley and Ted Robinson weigh in.
